profile:
Heating and Cooling is what we do, but family is at the heart of who we are. For more than 13 years, we haven’t just been your trusted comfort partner; we’ve been the Ashton Family business.  Priding ourselves on prompt, professional service, we work hard to give you and your family the value and quality that you deserve. 

We offer no cost, no pressure in home consultations to answer all of your questions about purchasing new appliances like furnaces, air conditioners, fireplaces and more. You can breathe easy with a detailed duct cleaning service, or talk to a comfort advisor about how you can reduce dust, eliminate cold rooms and save money with the Aeroseal Duct Sealing process that seals your ducts from the inside.

Don’t wait days for service, or wait on hold for hours, and enjoy a variety of flexible payment options, including financing, that make doing business with us easy. We even offer monthly maintenance and protection plans for your appliances so you can stop worrying about surprise repair bills. Hey- that’s what family is for, right? 

Contact us today and let us help you Be More Comfortable.

specialities:
We specialize in Oil to natural gas conversion, Premium quality new custom home installation and Quality installation of ductwork zoning and in-floor heating. We can zone your entire house to make sure that each area is the exact temperature you want it!

Contact Us For all your HVAC needs.

Personalized Approach

profile:
Five Lions Heating & Cooling is a Toronto based company. We are independently owned and operated. At Five Lions Heating & Cooling we specialize in air quality solutions in your home. Whether residential or commercial we provide services in installations, repairs and maintenance.
We extend our HVAC services throughout the GTA and even further! Five Lions Heating & Cooling is available 7 days a week, 24 hours a day. We’re dedicated and committed in completing all our job duties. We find solutions and the right fit for better air quality. Our priority is in making our customers happy and comfortable in any space.


When you choose Five Lions Heating & Cooling, we strive to make you feel confident that you’re getting the highest quality in both products and service. We’re committed to delivering complete customer satisfaction in everything we do.


Five Lions Heating & Cooling is fully licensed and operates under the Technical Standards & Safety Authority (TSSA). We also carry 2 million liability insurance. Protecting our customers to ensure safety is very important us. Our professional HVAC team is highly qualified and experienced in installations and repairs. Five Lions Heating & Cooling, is a company that you can count on to service all your residential and commercial needs.

profile:
EXTEL Gas Services Inc has been providing heating and cooling services in Greater Toronto Residential and Commercial Businesses for over 10 years. For new and existing homes we provide the experience, knowledge and friendly customer service to design, install, maintain and repair all types of heating systems. Specialize in hot water heating systems, we work with radiators, gas boilers, hybrid system, tankless water heaters, hydronic radiant heating systems (radiant floors) and solar heating. We also install natural gas furnaces.

At EXTEL Gas services Inc our service and knowledgeable installation technician will explain and help you choose the right air conditioning system to fit your home cooling needs.

We specialize in installing split system air conditioning systems, and ductless air conditioning systems. Call us for your home air conditioning (AC) needs and stay cool in the summer at a low cost.

We also provide HVAC Installation and Maintenance service for small commercial buildings or residential house. For new or existing buildings we can install custom sheet metal ducts that have been designed for your forced air heating and cooling needs, using quality air handlers, and natural gas furnaces that move air effectively and efficiently to maintain a consistent indoor environment for all seasons of the year.

Our company has helped those families during winter blizzards, as well as families on the other end of the spectrum, being stranded without a functioning air conditioner when it’s hot out in Toronto. In either situation, our customers just want the job to be done appropriately in an efficient manner. So, our standards aim to match those needs. We’re available every hour of the day for service calls, we have same-day service options and our technicians are prompt and reliable.

We also know that it’s not always exciting to spend your hard-earned dollars on HVAC, which is why our company works to make it affordable. With in-home cost estimates, you’ll know exactly how much you’re spending and what you’ll receive for that money. Additionally, your energy bills can go down after making sure that your HVAC Systems are as efficient as they can be.

If you have questions or comments about solutions we can provide, we urge you to give us a call at 416 849 7997 or schedule an appointment online. While you may be paying for an air conditioner, what you’re really receiving is peace of mind – and we’re happy to provide it for you.

profile:
Energy Heating and Cooling contractors specialize in the installation and repair of forced air gas Furnaces and Central Air Conditioning. We have been servicing the Toronto and Durham Region for over 35 years. We are a locally owned company who takes extreme pride in servicing, repairing, and installing Furnace and Air Conditioner needs. 

Our company has built their reputation on ensuring we have always met our customers needs.  By building a relationship with our customers, completing projects on time and on budget, we have continued to gain the confidence and respect of our existing valued customers.

Energy Heating and Cooling will supply and Install Gas Lines, Duct Work, Fireplaces, Humidifiers, Furnace and A/C Maintenance and Repair, and work with ALL brands & Models.

With Energy Heating and Cooling, you can be confident knowing that our technicians will work with you to solve your concerns as quickly and efficiently as possible, while providing you quality service and the best price.

Energy Heating and Cooling will assess the work, provide a quote/estimate, arrange a convenient time that works for you.  

Customers can count on us for consultation, installation, information, excellent and professional workmanship every time.

Your home is your castle, and our contractors will treat as such.  Our technicians will respect and clean up after they have completed the project, and will also provide you with follow up tips on maintaining your furnace and AC in good working condition moving forward. 

Our motto is no job is too big or too small!
